Detailed Description

The Keyboard Management routines of the HP49.

Definition in file hpkeyb49.h.

Function Documentation

char keyb_getkey (  int    wait ) 
 

Scan the keyboard, return the COL*0xf + ROW key position.

Parameters:
wait  [in] in wait == 1 then wait for a key press/release
Returns:
0 if no key
Col * 0xf + Row else

int keyb_isAlpha (  void    ) 
 

Test for Alpha Key pressed.

Returns:
1 if key is pressed
0 else
Uses the GPFDAT register.

int keyb_isAnyKeyPressed (  void    ) 
 

Test for any Key pressed.

Returns:
1 if a key is pressed
0 else

int keyb_isKeyPressed (  unsigned char    col,
unsigned char    row
) 
 

Test for a (col,row) Key pressed.

Returns:
1 if key is pressed
0 else
Uses the GPFDAT, and GPGCON registers.
